attributes.action: make a temporary parking scheme for the temporaraly disabled
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This scheme would help the temporaraly disabled to get a blue badge. This blue badge would give the temporaraly disabled the opourtnity to park in disabled spaces while they are disabled. The badge would be a badge that would run out after 3 months, for example.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
